perturbation.original_text: 3. To the extent, if any, that provision of this Agreement conflicts with or differs from any provision of the Agreement, such provision of this Second Amendment shall prevail and govern for all purposes and in all respects.
perturbation.changed_text: 3. To the extent, if any, that provision of this Agreement conflicts with or differs from any provision of the Agreement, the original agreement shall prevail and govern for all purposes and in all respects.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction by stating that the original agreement prevails in case of conflict, directly opposing the common legal practice of the most recent amendment taking precedence. This creates uncertainty about which terms are enforceable.

perturbation.original_text: 4. Except as modified hereby, the Agreement and its terms and provisions are hereby ratified and confirmed for all purposes and in all respects.
perturbation.changed_text: 4. The Agreement and its terms and provisions are subject to change based on future verbal agreements between PCQ and ABW. Any changes will not be formally recorded. Except as modified hereby, the Agreement and its terms and provisions are hereby ratified and confirmed for all purposes and in all respects.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces a contradiction by stating that the terms and provisions are ratified and confirmed while also suggesting they can be changed via unrecorded verbal agreements. This creates massive uncertainty about the real enforceability of any term in the contract.

perturbation.original_text: 5. This Second Amendment may be executed in several counterparts, each of which shall be deemed an original but all of which collectively shall constitute the same instrument.
perturbation.changed_text: 5. This Second Amendment may be executed in several counterparts, however only the counterpart held by PCQ shall be deemed the official original. All of which collectively shall constitute the same instrument.
perturbation.explanation: This introduces a contradiction by stating that only one counterpart shall be deemed the official original. This creates legal uncertainty, given that both parties are supposed to sign it, it creates unbalance and contradiction about which document to use.
